titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Robespierre. Dramma in 5 quadri. Epoca dal 1789 al 1793, about 1893 RL.11447
titlestmt.author: Alice L. Poffinberger

publicationstmt.publisher: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2017-04-25 09:28:21 -0400.

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Robespierre. Dramma in 5 quadri. Epoca dal 1789 al 1793
did.abstract: Vincenzo Andrei was a professor at the Royal Institute of Music in Florence. Collection comprises a manuscript volume (133 pages) containing Vincenzo Andrei's "Robespierre. Dramma in 5 quadri. Epoca dal 1789 al 1793," handwritten in Italian. The volume is dedicated to (Costantino?) Ressman, an Italian ambassador.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Vincenzo Andrei was a professor at the Royal Institute of Music in Florence.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Robespierre. Dramma in 5 quadri. Epoca dal 1789 al 1793, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection comprises a manuscript volume (133 pages) containing Vincenzo Andrei's "Robespierre. Dramma in 5 quadri. Epoca dal 1789 al 1793," handwritten in Italian. The volume is dedicated to (Costantino?) Ressman, an Italian ambassador.
